## AutoUpdatingLoader.activate() method

Promote the [pending](./embedded.autoupdatingloader.pending.md) embedded policy decision point bundle (if any) to active, so that it is used to evaluate policy decisions.

**Signature:**

```typescript
activate(): void;
```

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

This method is a no-op if an update has not been downloaded, or if [AutoUpdateOptions.activateOnLoad](./embedded.autoupdateoptions.activateonload.md) is `true` (the default).
